item.title: 56a Chesterfield Grove-Flytipping 4th Complaint, 28th February
item.description:
4th complaint: Flytipping has yet again occurred from here. Health and safety hazard where a large cardboard box in the middle of the pavement, blocking the walkway. It can cause injury to the elderly and/visually impared. Multiple complaints of this conduct submitted but the flytipping keeps occurring, thus now reporting the number of times the complaints have been filed, highlighting the complete disregard of not adhering to law regarding fly tipping.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 25, Chesterfield Grove, East Dulwich, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
